title: WTB: All Cobbs in Lower Grades
author: mjsilvey80

posts.post_title: WTB: All Cobbs in Lower Grades
posts.post_content: Looking for all T206s Cobbs. I used to post/buy/sell here years ago but job loss forced me out of collecting and looking to get going again. Thanks!
See me at the National.  I have a bunch of them that I've been stockpiling for a year now.

[quote name="Donscards" post=1673106]See me at the National.  I have a bunch of them that I've been stockpiling for a year now.[/QUOTE]

The Recent June Vintage Collector magazine has a nice article about the T206 Cobb cards---it may be a eye catcher to have the copy along with your display-

When I picked up a couple last week, I didn't realize the Bat on Shoulder was the second toughest example (per the article)--I saw a Red back posted on here for sale for 1200--just wish it was graded--good luck at the National
Bump. Still looking for lower grades that present nicely. Not concerned with back damage.
I have two lower graded Cobbs (Red and bat off) on their way back from PSA.  Might be too beat up for you but let me know if you want scans
Bump. Got a red and still looking for the others. Might entertain a little higher grade(see: willing to pay a little more) on the bat off. Thanks
